22-010SC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting of Thursday, March 24, 2022.A motion was made by Commissioner Dillon, seconded by Vice Chair Gaytan, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Alan Tolkoff, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerAbsent: 5 - Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock, Coby Skye and Sona Coffee2.

22-011SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the Aquarium of the Pacific on Conservation and Community Connections through Volunteering.Cassandra Davis, Volunteer Services Manager Aquarium of the Pacific, spoke; and presented a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Wheeler spoke.Commissioner Tolkoff spoke.Cassandra Davis, Volunteer Services Manager Aquarium of the Pacific, spoke.Vice Chair Gaytan spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Gaytan and Cassandra Davis, Volunteer Services Manager Aquarium of the Pacific.Larry Rich, Sustainability Coordinator, spoke.Commissioner Bergeron-Birge spoke.Cassandra Davis, Volunteer Services Manager Aquarium of the Pacific, spoke.Commissioner Gaines spoke.Page 2 of 5CITY COUNCIL CHAMBERS411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDLONG BEACH, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, MAY 26, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESA dialogue ensued between Commissioner Gaines and Cassandra Davis, Volunteer Services Manager Aquarium of the Pacific, spoke.Chair Wheeler spoke.Cassandra Davis, Volunteer Services Manager Aquarium of the Pacific, spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Tolkoff, seconded by Commissioner Gaines, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Carla Dillon, Keisha Gaines, Alan Tolkoff, Hilda Gaytan and Morgan WheelerAbsent: 5 - Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock, Coby Skye and Sona Coffee3.
